value.name: Man accused of attacking woman he did not know on busy Manchester street
value.description: A man accused of attacking a woman at random on a busy street in Manchester is being held in jail. Jimmy Manuel Flores, 31, faces several charges that include sexual assault. value.name: Manchester man charged after Central High student said he reached into a car and grabbed her
value.description: A city man was charged with sexual assault after police said he grabbed a high school student he did not know through a car window last week.

value.name: Man faces charges after allegedly attacking woman inside her car on Beech Street
